typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		NUMERO_ORDINE as string,
		DATA_CREAZIONE as date,
		CANALE_SORGENTE as string,
		INTESTATARIO as string,
		TIPO_INTESTATARIO as string,
		PREZZO_PRODOTTO as short,
		QUANTITA as boolean,
		IMPORTO_IVA as string,
		NOME_PRODOTTO as string,
		TIPO_PRODOTTO as string,
		DESCRIZIONE as string,
		COD_PRODOTTO as string,
		STAZ_PARTENZA as string,
		STAZ_ARRIVO as string,
		AMBIENTE as string,
		INIZIO_VALIDITA as date,
		FINE_VALIDITA as string,
		DATI_NTV as string,
		TESTO_IVA as string,
		METODO_PAGAMENTO as string,
		NUM_RICEVUTA as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
